description: SSE mode baseline - get_location with denial flow (MULTI-REQUEST: confirmation + rejection)
source: Synthesized from get_location confirmation pattern + process_payment denial pattern
scenario: User denies get_location tool call - complete flow from confirmation request to rejection
note: This fixture captures TWO separate HTTP requests: (1) Initial request ending with confirmation [DONE], (2) Denial response ending with rejection [DONE]. It serves as documentation of the complete denial flow, not for single-stream transport testing. Transport tests verify one [DONE] per stream.

toolConfirmation.hint: Please approve or reject the tool call get_location() by responding with a FunctionResponse with an expected ToolConfirmation payload.

expectedChunks.delta: 現在地の取得リクエストは承認されませんでした。位置情報の共有が必要な場合は、再度お知らせください。
